verses.name: Proverbs 19:22
verses.text: The desire of a man is his kindness: and a poor man is better than a liar.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:23
verses.text: The fear of the Lord tendeth to life: and he that hath it shall abide satisfied; he shall not be visited with evil.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:24
verses.text: A slothful man hideth his hand in his bosom, and will not so much as bring it to his mouth again.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:25
verses.text: Smite a scorner, and the simple will beware: and reprove one that hath understanding, and he will understand knowledge.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:26
verses.text: He that wasteth his father, and chaseth away his mother, is a son that causeth shame, and bringeth reproach.
